articles.title: Romance on Valentine's Day? The Old Boys say some do, some don't but respect is key
articles.description: Taking it slow and sneaking "a few kisses in a parked car after the movies" worked for these couples. Here are some of their secrets to making love last.
articles.content:
Jeff and Agnus Lawler have been married for 68 years and don't celebrate Valentine's Day, while John Bay married his sweetheart 42 years ago and it's an occasion he and his wife always marked.
While… [+4201 chars]

articles.title: Apple Pulls Popular Movie Piracy App Kimi From the App Store
articles.description: Before it disappeared on Tuesday, Kimi enabled iPhone owners to stream illegal bootlegs of popular movies like "Barbie" and "Oppenheimer."
articles.content: Watching pirated movies on your iPhone just got a little harder. After climbing the charts of Apples App Store, the trendy Kimi app, with its collection of bootlegged movies, has just disappeared. Pr… [+2593 chars]
